message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the price of $12,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering its value and potential. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is already a competitive price.  Could you meet me at $11,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to go above $10,000 for this product. Would you consider $9,500?
